general: IMPLEMENT DARK MODE BY DEFAULT. The app should feel like a terminal or a high-end diagnostic tool.
Use 'Azeret Mono' for all headings and data values (scores). Use 'Manrope' for explanatory text.
Avoid rounded corners > 4px. Keep it sharp and technical.
Use the 'noise' texture overlay on the body background to prevent flat black.
The 'Cooked' score reveal should be dramatic. Use the 'hero_bg' (thermal image) as a subtle background behind the score card.
layout_rules: Marketing Page: Use a 'Tetris' grid. Big bold text on the left, abstract thermal visual on the right.
Analysis Page: The upload area should look like a 'Scanner Plate'. Use a dashed border that animates on hover.
Results Page: Use a dense 'Bento' grid. The Score is the 'Hero' cell (col-span-2 row-span-2). Feedback items are smaller cells.
animation_rules: Add a 'scanline' animation that moves down the screen during the 'Analyzing' state.
Stagger the entrance of result cards.
Numbers (Score) should count up from 0 to the final score.

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text.
Do not use generic AI emojis.
Ensure all interactive elements have hover states.
